articles.title: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Rise amid Hot Jobs, Fewer Cut Bets
articles.mainIdea: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Rise amid Hot Jobs, Fewer Cut Bets
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Rise amid Hot Jobs, Fewer Cut Bets. The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Dec, 25 2025 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with contracts linked to the S and P 500 up about 0.3 percent, as investors juggle strong US jobs signals against shifting interest rate hopes. Weekly jobless claims dropped to 214,000, meaning fewer people are filing for unemployment and the job market is still running warm, which can keep wages and prices firm. At the same time, the 10 year Treasury yield has eased to around... Related tickers mentioned: ASTS, MU, NKE, ^GSPC.

articles.summary: Barrons.com: Review & Preview: All Was Quiet. The S&P 500 is on track to post its third consecutive annual gain, bringing its total three-year rise to 80%. Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, NKE, ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.
